parameters.name: CurveArray
parameters.description: Array of curves of size CurveCount

parameters.name: BoundsArray
parameters.description: Array of curve bounds of size CurveCount*2

title: ISurface.IIntersectSurface
signature:
System.Boolean IIntersectSurface( 
   Surface
OtherSurf
,
   System.Int32
CurveCount
,
   out Curve
CurveArray
,
   out System.Double
BoundsArray
)

parameters.name: CurveArray
parameters.description: Array of curves of size CurveCount

parameters.name: BoundsArray
parameters.description: Array of curve bounds of size CurveCount*2

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ISurface::GetIntersectSurfaceCount
to get the curve count for this surface-surface intersection.
